name: Fidget Spinner Match 3
description:
Looking for a new addictively match 3 game? Fidget Spinner match 3 is going to change your way of playing same old match 3 game forever. Connect 3 or more same spinners to blast them out. Dash through the puzzles alone or challenge friends to see who can get the highest score.

But you need to be quick – it’s not so easy when you have to race against the clock! You've got exact 13 seconds to make score to get pass level.

Use your skills at solving puzzle games to help you beat levels and explore 50 levels of fidget spinners world. No more popping bubbles, blasting blocks, crushing candies, or matching jewels. This is the Fidget Spinner! Connect the spinners and enjoy this fun and free puzzle game.

Fidget Spinner Match 3 Game Features:
- Easy and Free to play
- Drag and match 3 of the spinners
- 50 challenging levels
- Quick Start
- Cute and colorful graphics
- Multiple difficulty levels
- Fun for all ages
